text: Ion Heliade Rădulescu or Ion Heliade (also known as Eliad or Eliade Rădulescu January 6, 1802 – April 27, 1872) was a Wallachian-born Romanian academic, Romantic and Classicist poet, essayist, short story writer, newspaper editor and politician. ==Related pages== * List of Romanian social scientists == Other websites == * The Humanities and The Social Sciences in The Academy. Literature, Folklore and the Arts , at the Romanian Academy site Category:1802 births Category:1872 deaths Category:Romanian poets Category:Romanian journalists Category:Romanian social scientists Category:19th-century philosophers Category:Romanian politicians
title: Ion Heliade Rădulescu
